website_summaries.verdict: A scent-free option that's water-resistant and gentle on sensitive skin.
pros: Does a good job of protecting against burns with solid UVA and UVB coverage
Does fine with makeup over it, once it's absorbed
cons: Some customers found the consistency too oily

customer_reviews.title: The only sun protection I use is Solbar
customer_reviews.text: The only sun protection I use on my sensitive skin and I've tried dozens. Does not make me breakout. Does not have harsh chemicals that destroy my skin and in fact, my skin looks better after using. Once I work it in, this 38spf version of Solbar is barely noticeable and quite frankly, I don't care if somebody notices!
customer_reviews.author: bhart

customer_reviews.title: Recommend by a cancer/chemo survivor
customer_reviews.text: As a cancer survivor, my skin post chemo 9 years out, still is extra sensitive to the sun! This sunscreen is a GOD SENT !!! Only one I use !!! I tan with this and do not burn at all!!! Without it, I would be as red as a lobster !
customer_reviews.author: Kadence g

customer_reviews.title: Does not burn eyes
customer_reviews.text: Does not burn my eyes. Most sun screens burn my eyes when sweat runs down my face. I use this daily. It does leave my face feeling slightly oily.
customer_reviews.author: Rip

customer_reviews.title: Love this sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: Love this sunscreen!! I have tried at least a dozen on my face that are also great moisturizers and don't clog pores. Solbar is hands down the very best! It goes on smooth and doesn't turn my face all white. I can put make up on over it without any problems. I've reordered 4 times since when I first used it.
customer_reviews.author: KMathison

customer_reviews.title: ... our dermatologist for my daughters Dermatitis Ezcema and we love this brand
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a sample from our dermatologist for my daughters Dermatitis Ezcema and we love this brand. Our whole family uses this. It also doesn’t leave white residue on your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Wear every day!
customer_reviews.text: After working for a Dermatologist and seeing a lot of skin cancer, I started wearing this every day over my moisturizer, RAIN or SHINE. After 10 years I am still using this product to protect my moisture barrier and keep those harmful rays away. I am often mistaken for someone 10 years younger than my current age. (stopped sunbathing at 40). Pairs well with Hyaluronic Acid.
customer_reviews.author: mimi

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by my dermatologist
customer_reviews.text: After many years in the sun, my doctor recommended this product for my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Super Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic--Over 12 years without a burn
customer_reviews.text: We spend a lot of time outside. When our son was an infant, our pediatrician recommended this to us. We have been using this for over 12 years and our fair complected child has never had a burn. highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Dunworth

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by my dermatologist
customer_reviews.text: I swim on average one hour, three times a week. I also frequent the beach often. I use this sunscreen each time and feel this really protects my skin. I never get burned. I also love the fact that it’s sheer. I’ve also used Solbar Shield but it’s much thicker making it hard to blend in and even harder to remove. I’ve tried many sunscreens and this is my favorite!
customer_reviews.author: KSchneider

customer_reviews.title: More watery than it used to be.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years, as it is one of the few sunblocks to which I am not allergic. It offers good protection. However the product is more runny now, coming out of the tube and making a mess. Perhaps the formula was tweaked a bit. As expensive as this product is, the manufacturer needs to return the product to it’s previous quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sun Screen
customer_reviews.text: So happy to find the Solbar sunscreen on Amazon. The pharmacy I used to buy it from no longer sells it, so I was pleased to find that I could order it on line. This zinc oxide product is the only sunscreen I can use and I highly recommend it to anyone with sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: susan echelman

customer_reviews.title: turn to foam?
customer_reviews.text: Iv'e used this product several times in both salt water and fresh water.......every time I've come out of the water, the sunscreen seems to turn to a light, white foam on my skin. In talking to manufacturer's customer service, they said that perhaps the product was stored improperly by the seller....ie: in a hot warehouse or storage container. Seems like a big concern to me, if a product designed to be used in the sun cannot get hot or it loses effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Was recommended by my physician, and does what it purports to do.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Bush

customer_reviews.title: Good Sun Protection
customer_reviews.text: Dermatologist said to use on a daily basis. Easy to apply and a little bit goes a long way. Seems to be helping my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: No burns!
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely pale and this sunscreen kept me from getting burned on my honeymoon in Jamaica. Rubs in clear just as advertised. A bit greasy feeling but that's to be expected with most sunscreens.
customer_reviews.author: K. Romens

customer_reviews.title: Good for uva, uvb
customer_reviews.text: I used this brand over 8 yes already, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kanes X. Huang

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, long lasting sunscreen!
customer_reviews.text: Use this product often while spending a day at the lake. It's a great sunscreen and stays on for a long time, even when swimming. Rubs in nicely, so no white film on your face and offers great protection from the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Neal

customer_reviews.title: BEST SPF
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with this SPF. Anything under 30 is not gonna protect you, and this is 38. I also don’t like chemical SPFS cause they can irritate, but physical are often super blotchy and leave a grey cast. This though is the perfect mix, it’s a physical SPF and it leaves no grey cast!! Recommend to all complexions. Also I am obsessed w the dewiness it gives me. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Sof

customer_reviews.title: good for problem skin
customer_reviews.text: i have sensitive acne prone skin and this is great. doesnt make me oily and almost airbrushes my face
customer_reviews.author: S A

customer_reviews.title: Solbar
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years and have never sunburned when I apply it well. Unfortunately it contains cancer causing chemicals, so I will be buying another brand in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Arbogast

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good easy coverage and does not leave a white residue.
customer_reviews.author: irish realtor

customer_reviews.title: Doctor Prescribed
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Solbar for years to protect my face and it works beautifully. Not greasy and lasts all day. Excellent product.

customer_reviews.title: Not at all greasy and rubs in almost clear!
customer_reviews.text: Sunscreen is great! Not at all greasy and stays on well. Rubs in almost clear and doesn't want of like think spot seems to.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best sunscreen ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best sunscreen I’ve ever had! It is truly moisturizing and I love the transparent zinc. It is thick and does not smell. A friend tried mine and decided to buy it too- I suggest you try it too!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney L.

customer_reviews.title: Great safe sunblock
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a simple zinc based sunblock. This is a thick cream that rubs in quite well. An advantage is that it also seems to moisturize my skin, my arms always feel better and I have less dry skin itch when I use it.
customer_reviews.author: C Brown

customer_reviews.title: Safe and easy to spread sunscreen!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sunscreen. We used it on both my young kids on a beach vacation and neither got burns (despite being in and out of the pool!). I also found it easy to spread even though it is a zinc based product which is super nice!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Brunton

customer_reviews.title: but love that this does rub into the skin and stay ...
customer_reviews.text: I am very sensitive to sunscreens. I want the basic zinc protection, but love that this does rub into the skin and stay clear.

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage protection.
customer_reviews.text: My dermatologist recommended this product years ago and I have been using it since then. A little goes a long way.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product

customer_reviews.title: Good protection
customer_reviews.text: This seems to work well for me to use as an all in one for sunscreen and moisturizer. I have very sensitive skin for an older female who needs good protection.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Anne

customer_reviews.title: solbar Zinc Cream
customer_reviews.text: Great protection, shipped in safe packaging and arrived as promised.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product.  It is the best sunscreen I have found for the face.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It is the best sunscreen I have found for the face.

customer_reviews.title: Sunscreen for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This sun screen is a 5 star product due to the zinc ingredient and the moisturizing quality. It's perfect for the face and neck.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn L. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Highly recommended by my dermatologist, and I use it everyday, yearround under makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Great sun protection
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding! So glad my dermatologist recommended this product to me. Spent a week in the sunshine and no sun skin problems.
customer_reviews.author: mat

customer_reviews.title: A TRUE mineral based sunscreen without cancer causing ingredients.
customer_reviews.text: We go thru the sunscreen. This is our absolute favorite and we have tried many over the years. Not only is it a healthy sunscreen, it glides on smoothly. This product is mineral based without cancer causing ingredients. I recently read that Oxybenzone is showing up in your blood stream after applying it to your skin........NO THANK YOU! This product is oxybenzone free and the active ingredients are minerals. This the the type of sunscreen you want to use. It is also a fair price in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Best sunscreen for the face (and acne/PIH)
customer_reviews.text: I'm a regular user of this sunscreen for the past 6 years through the trials and tribulations of acne on cinnamon color skin and I love it. It's the perfect sunscreen in a regimen for reducing hyperpigmentation and curbing acne because it blocks the sun and it isn't comedogenic. It works better than the other facial sunscreens that I would try every now and then.
customer_reviews.author: Nia

customer_reviews.title: This product works!
customer_reviews.text: I am allergic to the sun and many sun screen products. Solbar Zinc SPF 38 is the only sun screen I can use. I went through many samples that the dermatologist provided but Solbar is the only one I could tolerate. I used the SPF 50 for many years and then changed to the SPF 38 with zinc. It was thicker and applies nicely. As with other products, you do have to re-apply after 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Pat N

customer_reviews.title: Great sunscreen.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. It doesn't make me break out, it actually makes my skin feel really smooth and moisturized. It absorbs well and isn't greasy. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Gentle, non-greasy, and effective
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this years ago at a dermatologist's office because of my sensitive skin, and have used it ever since. It absorbs well and is a good base for a mineral foundation. It should be reapplied if you're sweating a lot. This is a good value and the vendor shipped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Home Planet Images

customer_reviews.title: Great zinc sunscreen that does not turn you overly white ...
customer_reviews.text: Great zinc sunscreen that does not turn you overly white and washes off easy. I have used others in the past that you have to wash your face multiple times to feel like it is off...not this one. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was recommended by my Dermatologist who gave me a free sample
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by my Dermatologist who gave me a free sample. I liked it because it has zinc oxide in it, but yet is pretty light feeling on your face. I have yet to wear it in summer, the real test of how it feels on your skin & how long it lasts till you have to reapply.

customer_reviews.title: How great is that
